General.Name: Xian Peri Power Semiconductor Cond
General.Description: Xi'an Peri Power Semiconductor Converting Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and services power semiconductor discrete devices, power electronic converters, and power semiconductor device test and other equipment. The company offers power semiconductor devices, such as high-power thyristors and rectifiers, power semiconductor modules, IGBT modules, and radiator; and power electronics, including high-power complete set, high-power rectifier and control system, and production line equipment site. It also provides test and application development equipment comprising DBC series power semiconductor device and reliability test equipment. In addition, the company engages in power conversion and energy storage. Its products are used in electric power, rail transit, iron and steel metallurgy, machinery manufacturing, environmental protection, petroleum, chemical industry, automobile manufacturing, shipbuilding, mining, nuclear industry, military industry, and other fields. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Xi'an, China. Xi'an Peri Power Semiconductor Converting Technology Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xi'an Power Electronics Technology Research Institute.
